annotations.description: On this episode of How to Drink, I present the New York Sour or as it might have been known in the 1890's a Fancy Sour. There were "Fancy" variations of all ...
annotations.title: New York Sour | How to Drink

textContent:
1oz Lemon juice
.5oz Gomme/Simple syrup
.25oz Curcao (not recommended) 
1 Egg white (not recommended) 
2oz Rye

Dry shake then shake with ice
Pour into chilled glass
Add float of red wine
Garnish with whatever (Cherry, lemon, orange, etc)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N6b1cxMwxzU
title: New York Sour
